title: Suddenly a Spy
description: On her wedding day, Veronica Sinclair thinks she has it all: the loving family, the Vera Wang dress, the hunky husband. But then a mysterious and beautiful woman shows up at the reception, suggesting Veronica's new hubby isn't exactly who he says he is. As if that weren't enough, Veronica and Richard must flee gunmen in the middle of their honeymoon, convincing Veronica she got more than she bargained for when she said, "I do."Thrown into a world of espionage, seduction, and human trafficking, Veronica must fight for the life and husband she thought she had - and she must discover whether they are the life and husband she truly wants.Don't miss Heather Huffman's other books: Throwaway, Jailbird, Ring of Fire, Ties That Bind, Tumbleweed,Â and the newly-released Devil in Disguise!
author: Heather Huffman
